description: Terminates active Client VPN endpoint connections. This action can be used to terminate a specific client connection, or up to five connections established by a specific user.

parameters.name: ClientVpnEndpointId
parameters.description: The ID of the Client VPN endpoint to which the client is connected.

nested_items.name: ClientVpnEndpointId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Client VPN endpoint.

nested_items.name: Username
nested_items.description: The user who established the terminated client connections.

nested_items.name: ConnectionStatuses
nested_items.description: The current state of the client connections.

nested_items.name: ConnectionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the client connection.

nested_items.name: PreviousStatus
nested_items.description: The state of the client connection.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The state of the client connection.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A message about the status of the client connection, if applicable.

nested_items.name: CurrentStatus
nested_items.description: A message about the status of the client connection, if applicable.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The state of the client connection.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A message about the status of the client connection, if applicable.
